section.section:
With the advice of the Council, the Secretary shall:
develop annually a Program plan; and
submit the plan to the Governor and General Assembly for approval as part of the annual State budget.

The plan shall set forth priorities for:
funding grants for innovative services to seniors; and
training personnel who provide services to seniors in the State.

The plan shall include provisions for:
funding grants that are sought by Communities for a Lifetime to the extent practicable; and
evaluating any program funded under the plan.

text.section: The Secretary may accept money from any public or private source to fund grants awarded under this subtitle.
